Interface org.globalplatform.Authority

Documentation changed from old to new.

Changed Methods
void init(byte) Documentation changed from old to new.
 Initializes the Authority interface with the appropriate mode (MODE_SIGN or MODE_KEY_RECOVERY).
short recoverKey(byte[], short, short, byte[], short) Documentation changed from old to new.
 Recovers a cryptographic key from a set of data structures provided in the input buffer (inBuff).
short sign(byte[], short, short, byte[], short) Documentation changed from old to new.
 Generates the signature of all/last input data.
void update(byte[], short, short) Documentation changed from old to new.
 Accumulates input data.
 

Changed Fields
byte MODE_KEY_RECOVERY Documentation changed from old to new.
 Used with .init method to indicate key recovery mode.
byte MODE_SIGN Documentation changed from old to new.
 Used with .init method to indicate signing mode.
